page.title: 06Fiona's Day in Glenrothes
page.content: 7:30 on a cold misty morning.Sleeping peacefully.On goes my alarm,up I get. Go down stairs,let the dog out,make the breakfast and get dressed and washed.At last everythings ready.At 8:30 Jillian calls on me.We go to school.Reading for half an hour,really boring,but its soon over.At least theres choir.We got some songs from the musical "Fiddler on the Roof".Come back from the hall and did maths until playtime.After playtime we got language.We did writing about drama cards then we got story."Ladyhawke" is the title,its really good.After lunch we had art and discussion.Quite good.We go home at 3:15.We are giving a display tonight.Got washed again and went back to school.Display was great fun.Everyone loved the artwork and the dance we did.
